Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2018 08:48PM KT4421 wrote: I had the biopsy after a mammogram and a breast ultrasound. They followed it with a core needle biopsy. Good luck with your appointment. I hope all goes well.
Posts.Title: Went to doctor because of swollen lymph node. KT4421 KT4421

Posts.Content: KT4421 wrote: I am 49 and recently felt a lump under my left armpit. I later found out it was my lymph node. It was about 2 cm. I never felt a breast lump. I had not had a mammogram for years. I went to the doctor and a biopsy was done and came back positive for breast cancer in my lymph node. They said it was HER2 - and hormone sensitive and moderately differentiated. I am seeing doctors on Tuesday but I am so afraid that since it wasn't found until my lymph node was swollen that it is more advanced than stage 2. I have been healthy and do not have any other symptoms. Has anyone had a similar experience? I know I should just relax and wait for my appointment where they will run more scans but I have so much anxiety. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Went to doctor because of swollen lymph node. KT4421 KT4421

Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2018 08:54PM KT4421 wrote: Star2017 and msphil Thank you for your responses. It is so encouraging to hear stories like yours.
